definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
to be well aware of sth/to understand clearly

sentences.english: It's a contrast that grows more stark when seen through the eyes of history.
sentences.chinese: 这种对比在历史的视角下更为了然。

sentences.english: A sports organizer lets you see what’s where while keeping equipment in its place.
sentences.chinese: 运动器材存放处让你对它们的位置一目了然。

sentences.english: As far as I can see the whole matter is open-and-shut.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，整件事情是一目了然的。

sentences.english: B: Stick with the basics until you know them really well.
sentences.chinese: 坚守住基本原理，直到你了然于心。

sentences.english: It should be clear where this path leads.
sentences.chinese: 这条道路通向何方应该是一目了然的。

sentences.english: Running state Gao Qingzhi show all the way, be clear at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 运行状态全程高清直显，一目了然。

sentences.english: Large clear glass display surface, cabinet items at a glance.
sentences.chinese: 大面积清晰玻璃展示面，柜内物品一目了然。

sentences.english: Thisis a notion that general giap well understood, as did the master, sun tzu.
sentences.chinese: 武元甲将军对此了然于心，就像他的老师孙子那样。

sentences.english: There is little, by contrast, that Mr Hollis does not know about his characters.
sentences.chinese: 相反，赫里斯先生对其笔下人物了然于胸。

sentences.english: In this period right now, I don't like open-and-shut stuff.
sentences.chinese: 这个阶段，我不喜欢一目了然的东西。

sentences.english: Historical transition is not an abstract concept but clear to see.
sentences.chinese: 历史的过渡并非抽象的概念，在此一目了然。

sentences.english: Two unusual features of the Judicial Committee of the Privy Council should be borne in mind.
sentences.chinese: 枢密院司法委员会有两个特别的性质需要了然于胸。

sentences.english: It's ridiculous you're way too smart not to be here.
sentences.chinese: 你不在这里是在太甚聪了然，这真是荒诞乖张。

sentences.english: He's too smart to feel singled out by what happened to his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他如此聪明能够了然她妻子身上发生什么事。

sentences.english: You think I should understand, what I do not know miss know.
sentences.chinese: 你自认为懂我，应何不知错过便了然。

sentences.english: Their users already understood the concept of global variables.
sentences.chinese: 他们的用户对全局变量的概念应该了然于胸。

definition: hidden smile/smirk/to rejoice covertly/secret satisfaction concerning one's evil plans
to laugh involuntarily/Taiwan pr. [e4 ran2 shi1 xiao4]
to be surprised/to be amazed/to be stunned
